default.name: Moderate Reports
default.msg: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder report moderation. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder workflow module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.

state.name: Community Builder Moderate Reports
state.description: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder report moderation. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder workflow module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.
